metadata.name: [AB+/REP] Sprint Mod
metadata.description:
[h1]Sprint Mod by mitko8009[/h1] [b]Simple Sprinting Mod for The Binding of Isaac: Repentance[/b] The mod uses ModConfigMenu for some essential settings. The ModConfigMenu can be opened by pressing "L" on your keyboard. If you have issues with the mod, feel free to open a discussion or write a comment about it.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787][b]This mod requires to install the ModConfigMenu mod[/b][/url]
[quote=mitko8009]If someone wants to contribute to the project, please DM me on Discord or Instagram.[/quote]
[hr][/hr] [b]By: mitko8009[/b] Instagram: [url=https://www.instagram.com/mitko8009_/]@mitko8009_[/url] Discord: [b]mitko8009[/b] For bugs, create a new discussion on the mod page.
